climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: ADJUSTABLE FOR NECK PAIN RELIEF - UTTU Pillow features unique adjustable lofts for varied types of sleepers. Originally with a 4.7in of high contour and 3.9in of low contour, taking out the middle layer you’ll get 3.5in of high contour and 2.8in of low contour.

PRESSURE RELIEF - Made with UTTU DYNAMIC FOAM, the premium exclusive memory foam, this Side Sleeper Pillow conforms to the natural curve of your body and supports your neck and head to ensure comfort.
NEVER BECOMES HARD - We used UTTU DYNAMIC FOAM, which never gets hard in cold weather. Unlike most memory foam on the market, it remains consistent with firmness and comfort feel all year.
BREATHABLE COVER - This pillow has a cover made of highly breathable fabric, making it a COOLING PILLOW for you to stay cool all night long. The pillowcase is MACHINE WASHABLE.
ITEM DIMENSIONS - 23.6"×14"×4.7"/3.9", this cervical pillow is designed to fit different sleeping postures, you can sleep in comfort with UTTU whether on your back, side, or stomach.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Get Your Customized Pillow in 4 Simple Steps Unzip Unzip our cooling bamboo cover, detach it from the memory foam Take Out Take out the middle memory foam layer Align Align the top layer with the bottom layer Zip-up Put the cover back on and start a better sleep

Every Component is Dedicated to A Better Sleep Scientifically Zero Pressure Sleep UTTU Dynamic Foam with exclusive formula conforms to the natural curve of your neck dynamically, promotes proper spine alignment, and distributes pressure evenly. Effectively Reduce Neck & Back Pain Different people have their unique needs towards a pillow. UTTU pillow with adjustable height and ergonomic neck contour can help you with sleep-induced body pain. Cooling Bamboo Viscose Cover Extracted from the natural bamboo, our pillow cover is not only cool to touch but also can keep fresh, now you can sleep cool all night long.

The Ideal Pillow for Every Sleepers Side Sleeping Our high contour can fill the inter-space between your head and the mattress, relieves your pressure on the shoulder, and keeps your body spine properly aligned. Back Sleeping Our 3.5 to 3.9 inches medium height will be suitable for back sleepers. This height can help your head and cervical spine on the same level to ensure smooth breathing throughout the night. Stomach Sleeping Stomach sleepers should look for a pillow that's soft and compressible with a lower height, our 2.8 inches profile could be ideal for you, reducing the possibility of a neck strain.

UTTU Sandwich Pillow King Size UTTU Sandwich Pillow Travel Size UTTU Sandwich Pillow Queen Size Size 27.6×15.7×4.7/3.9 inches 15.7×11×4.7/3.9 inches 23.6×14×4.7/3.9 inches Material UTTU Dynamic Foam UTTU Dynamic Foam UTTU Dynamic Foam CertiPUR-US ✓ ✓ ✓ Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX ✓ ✓ ✓ Functionality Pillow for Sleeping Pillow for Sleeping Pillow for Sleeping Washable Cover ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was never a fan of these kinds of pillows but.....
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is not what I expected. For about three years I was sleeping on a M# Pill#w..... it was great, for a while.Problem was, it didn't support as well as I thought it did.After putting my back and neck out of place, sleeping on this pillow only served to worsen my back and neck pain. Ended up in chiropractic to get everything realigned.This was the point where I realized I needed a different pillow to properly support my neck.I purchased this pillow as it was the first one I came across and liked what I saw.I have to say, my neck and back pain have basically gone away. My chiropractor says after a couple more fine tuning/evaluation visits I will be down to just check ups every 6 months.All because of this pillow!The material is soft yet, firm. Adjusts to the natural contours of your neck and supports very well. Both sides rise up at different heights to allow for adjustment depending on how big or little you are and it has a removable center baffle for thse who need more support heighy.The pillow cover is zippered for easy access and helps keep the pillow together since it is actually in three separate pieces.The only issue I have is putting the pillow back into the pillow case. The memory foam wants to attach itself to the interior of the case and has kind of a velcro effect that makes it somewhat difficult to position the pillow properly within the case.Other than that, GREAT PRODUCT! Glad I purchased it and highly recommend it for those looking for a good contoured pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Similar to the eco-luxury, on-trend, Eucalyptus Lyocell encased options on the market.
reviews.reviewText: This is the better of the three memory foam pillows that I purchased. I purchased another pillow from a seller on Amazon that was a completely different type of pillow (even though it is also made of “memory foam”, it is shredded and not a “contour” pillow. I purchased a different contour pillow from Macy’s and they sent me the wrong product; I had intended for this pillow (the one that I am reviewing) to be my contour pillow, and the pillow from Macy’s was not supposed to be contoured, but they sent me the contour pillow anyway—so now I have that contour pillow to compare this one to. That pillow is smaller, and even though it is advertised as being “oversized”, it is too small for (it does not fill) my standard size pillowcases); thus, the pillowcase slips off. The pillow from Macy’s was listed with the retail price of $139; however, the one that they sent me (that I purchased for $23, so it was supposedly a Black Friday super markdown “deal”) and I found the same pillow on Amazon for $23, at $89 retail (so I am assuming that Amazon is correctly listing the suggested retail price, whereas Macy’s inflated the retail price in order to give the impression that it was a “crazy good deal” or that it was a “bargain that could not be refused” for potential buyers and window-shoppers during the Black Friday and “cyber Monday” season of consuming. This pillow (the one that I am reviewing) is far superior to the one that I had gotten “such an amazing deal on” from the Macy’s Black Friday sale. It is similar in its design, but larger and slightly firmer (it feels higher quality, like it will last longer; and it also stays just as cool as any memory foam pillow I have ever tried (including the “high end” brand makes and models, even those that boast being exclusively made of Eucalyptus Lyocell, those sold by or marketed alongside the hipster-chic and “eco-conscious”, “humanely” or “ethically manufactured” (that claim to be, and hopefully that actually are, but advertising copy can sometimes mislead—even when coming from these supposedly ethical (and certainly upscale) brands. This memory foam contour pillow (the one that I am reviewing) feels as good as Eucalyptus lyocell (it is made of rayon; this pillow is—viscose from bamboo, it is the same process being done to bamboo as is done to Eucalyptus to make the pulp that is viscose that makes rayon—so it does feel the same; it is just that the sustainability factor is not really discussed at all by brands that do not appeal strongly to the eco-chic upscale consumer bracket. I give this pillow a five-star rating in all categories in this review, because it is better than I expected; it is what it is (what it says it ys) and it does not claim to be ethical, sustainable, or revolutionary in terms of its place on the spectrum of memory foam pillows to try. It does not make the claim that this is “healthy” memory foam (there really is no such thing, considering what memory foam actually is). This is a decent pillow. It “sleeps cool” and is good for sleeping with spinal alignment issues, in my experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It took me some time to get used to this pillow. I tried it with and without the insert, multiple nights. I tried it on all sides. I've had it for about 3 months and have just now figured it out. I use it without the insert and sleep on the higher side (I am on a smaller person). I really like it. My neck issues have been resolved (I was suffering daily before I got this pillow). The lack of a star is because it does retain heat from my head. There is no flipping over a pillow like this to cool off, but it's worth it to me. I sleep on my side. I have found that with the insert in, laying on the higher side, it's great for laying on your back. The relief I feel in my neck is amazing. The case is soft and seems to be very good quality. The pillow holds its shape perfectly. I'm quite happy that I didn't give up on it. I would also like to add that I use this pillow with my "My Pillow" on top, if I want to watch TV, laying down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great neck support pillow
reviews.reviewText: I've had mine for almost two years now (since December 2021), and it's still going strong.A couple years ago I suddenly couldn't sleep right with my old pillow anymore and so I began to look for a new pillow. The first one I bought was some "hotel-quality" one that looked nice, but once I rest my head on it my head sunk right through it and I got zero neck support. I next tried a DreamyBlue pillow and at first it was great: it was giant, thick, and very fluffy. Alas, after a couple weeks I started getting neck pain from sleeping with my neck bent at a 45 degree angle each night because of how high off the bed the DreamyBlue pillow let my head rest.I next tried this UTTU Sandwich Pillow, and it was perfect right away. The neck support is great, and it's just thick and fluffy enough to support my head, as well. I sleep on it either on my side or on my back and it's very comfortable either way. Highly recommended for anyone that's developed neck pain from sleeping on traditional pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Comfortable Pillow- Best I owed ever!
reviews.reviewText: I tried several pillows as I sleep 💤 on both sides and sometimes on my back to get comfortable and this pillow supports my neck perfectly and wake up more refreshed than I have in years..7-8 hours good rest and ready to go. Thank you for great pillow!
This is the real thing. I have never been able to get comfortable in going to sleep. This product changed that for me on the first night. Thank you!
